author: JuliaRegistrator

comments.body: Pretty generic name. Maybe NormalMaps would be better? Usually it is good with a descriptive name, even if it is a bit longer, see https://julialang.github.io/Pkg.jl/v1/creating-packages/#Package-naming-guidelines-1

Good point. I have updated üëç 
Registrator has created the pull here: https://github.com/JuliaRegistries/General/pull/990
